headline: RBC Capital Boosts HCA Healthcare (HCA) PT to $555 on Robust 2026 Guidance
summary: HCA Healthcare Inc. (NYSE:HCA) is one of the most undervalued large cap stocks to invest in now. On January 28, RBC Capital raised its price target for HCA Healthcare to $555 from $525 while keeping an Outperform rating. This decision was made following the company’s strong Q4 2025 results and robust 2026 guidance. The firm […]

headline: Top Research Reports for Meta, Palantir and Amphenol
summary: Today's Research Daily features new research reports on 16 major stocks, including Meta Platforms, Inc. (META), Palantir Technologies Inc. (PLTR) and Amphenol Corporation (APH), as well as a micro-cap stock, National Research Corp. (NRC).
